channel.title: Upgrade on User Access Node (UAN)
channel.description: Recent content in Upgrade on User Access Node (UAN)

item.title: Merge UAN Configuration Data
item.description: Merge UAN Configuration Data Perform this procedure to update the UAN product configuration. Before performing this procedure: Perform Install the UAN Product Stream In this procedure, an upgrade from UAN 2.0.0 to UAN 2.3.1 is being performed. Administrators should replace the versions seen in this procedure with the versions being upgraded on the system. Additionally, this guide describes upgrading an integration branch. Each CFS branch responsible for configuring the various types of Application and UANs should be upgraded.

item.title: Notable Changes
item.description: Notable Changes The following guide describes changes included in a particular UAN version that may be of note during an install or upgrade. When an upgrade is being performed, please review the notable changes for all of the UAN versions up to the version being installed. If a particular version does not appear in this guide, it may have only had minor changes. For a full account of the changes involved in a release, consult the Change Log

item.title: Upgrades
item.description: Upgrades Performing an upgrade of UAN from one version to the next follows the same general process as a fresh install. Some considerations may need to be made when merging the existing CFS configuration with the latest CFS configuration provided by the release. The overall workflow for completing a UAN upgrade involves: Perform the UAN Installation Review any Notable Changes Merge UAN CFS Configuration Data
